mapper.select: SElECT mc.id AS courseId, mc.name AS courseName, t.name AS teacherName, cl.name AS className, mc.begin_week AS beginWeek, mc.end_week AS endWeek, mc.cover_url AS coverUrl FROM manager_course mc LEFT JOIN manager_teacher_course tc ON mc.id = tc.course_id LEFT JOIN manager_teacher t ON t.id = tc.teacher_id LEFT JOIN manager_class_course cc ON mc.id = cc.course_id LEFT JOIN manager_class cl ON cl.id = cc.class_id LEFT JOIN manager_student s ON s.class_id = cl.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
